reviews.review: good game, could be better if Valve had a better cheat control

хуёвая игра просрал аккаунты и часы 
!!!

The player disconnecting protocol in this game is horrible. You can't pause when it happens immediately so u just lost that round. U can only pause for 2 minutes (arbitrary time frame?). U don't get a bot to play as ur 5th so ur literally 4v5 the whole time. Then after they leave you still can't even abandon the game. Literally unplayable in the current state. 

Been playing cs since 1.3.  I will never play csgo again.

Pretty much everybody knows csgo at this point. What i like about the game is that you can get into it pretty easily but to actually get good you gotta grind and put in the hours. I don't have anything i dislike and even if i do i believe no games are perfect and that is also what makes it. So to anybody new i guess just try the game out and see if you love it like i do.
game is good but u can face cheaters and thats very annoying
